nodes.text: Olof was an Imperial Inquisitor during the Galactic Civil War. He was seen in the Imperial Prison on the planet Dathomir and once heard of a clan of dangerous Nightsisters, the Spiderclan, who had developed a strange symbiosis with some other creatures than the Rancor. He tasked an individual with seeking out this group, and pointed them towards the Nightspider Cult cave.
